messages.messageBody:
On Mon, 24 May 2004 21:23:07 -0700 (PDT), Tom Hatfieldさん wrote in message <20040525042307.70446.qmail@...>
>hi all
>
>im looking for more in depth maps of the provinces. yes i know there are maps
>at samurai-archives.com but i was hoping to find more. thanks for the help.
>

Tom,
What sort of detail are you looking for?

I asked about maps here a few weeks ago and got pointed to the
following online map in English. I find this to be very good.
http://flagspot.net/flags/jp(k.html

It gives the names and rough borders of the kuni in a clickable map

FYI, my email softward does not like the '(' in the above url. I have
to copy and past the whole thing into my browser for it to work.

Hope this moves you in the right direction!

--
Jay Kelly
oyakata@...

hi all

im looking for more in depth maps of the provinces. yes i know there are maps at samurai-archives.com but i was hoping to find more. thanks for the help.






Tom Hatfield
